page.title: 13ARMED FORCES
page.content: WITHIN OUR BLOCK IS THE NOW-DISUSED OLD SARUM AIRFIELD. UNTIL RECENTLY THIS WAS A JOINT WARFARE ESTABLISHMENT USED BY ALL BRANCHES OF THE SERVICES. IT WAS ABANDONED SOME FIVE YEARS AGO AND IS NOW UNDER THE CONTROL OF THE LAND SERVICES AGENCY. MANY SUGGESTIONS HAVE BEEN PUT FORWARD FOR ITS POSSIBLE USE IN THE FUTURE BUT AT PRESENT ITS LARGE MESSES, HANGARS AND SQUASH AND TENNIS COURTS ARE LEFT IDLE. SOME OF THE HANGARS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED FOR INDUSTRIAL USE AND THE OPTICA AIRCRAFT HAS BEEN DEVELOPED AND IS BEING BUILT HERE. SOME OF THE HOUSING IS BEING USED AS MARRIED QUARTERS FOR SERVICEMEN FROM U.K.L.F AT WILTON BUT THE MAJORITY OF THEM ARE EMPTY AND UNUSED. ONE PROPOSITION PUT FORWARD IS THAT THE SITE SHOULD BECOME A SPORTS AND LEISURE COMPLEX FOR THE PEOPLE OF SALISBURY AND DISTRICT.
